name: Expanded Spell List
description: At 1st level, the Undead lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you: 1st - Bane, False Life; 2nd - Blindness/Deafness, Phantasmal Force; 3rd - Phantom Steed, Speak with Dead; 4th - Death Ward, Greater Invisibility; 5th - Antilife Shell, Cloudkill.
